https://tmrev.io/movie/30448-Arch Enemy: Tyrants of the Rising Sun - Live in Japan 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6hKmK8igJAAD9OyntyHeoFWG8Fc.jpg Tyrants of the Rising Sun is a DVD+CD set of Arch Enemy, released in Europe on November 24, 2008 and in North America on November 25, 2008 via Century Media. The DVD contains a live show filmed in Tokyo in early 2008, an in-depth 40 minute road-movie feature, and all promotional videos that have been shot for the band's latest studio album, Rise of the Tyrant. Arch Enemy: Tyrants of the Rising Sun - Live in Japan
